hotels.description: Find sanctuary in private, pristine paradise on Maldives' secluded Dhonakulhi Island in The Signature Collection at Hideaway, an elevated curation of beachfront villas on the resort's northernmost point. This is five-star fancy at its finest, with dedicated butler service, private pools and access to four exquisite restaurants serving fresh seafood and Asian fusion alongside one of the largest whisky and fine champagne collections in the Maldives. Each villa is fitted with state-of-the-art accoutrements and Middle-Eastern-inspired furnishings in shades of Pacific blue and gold. Luxuriate on your private sundeck, or if you can pull yourself away from your own villa's paradise, retreat to Hideaway Spa, where therapists will pamper you with Ayurvedic treatments and cutting-edge Natura Biss√© products.
